rows.label: tlk43300011_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Never noticed before, but you guys
have a whole gaggle of Blades there,
don't ya?

rows.label: tlk43300011_04_msg0002
rows.name:
If you've got any kicking about doing
nothing, why not have them take on
a Merc Mission?

rows.label: tlk43300011_04_msg0003
rows.name:
There's plenty of folks in town who'd
appreciate a helping hand.

rows.label: tlk43300011_04_msg0004
rows.name:
You'll get some form of reward
and you'll net experience in the
process. Worth it, no?
